title: Display flex
description: Initiates the container as a flex container

title: Flex direction
description: This sets how flex items are placed in the flex container defining the main axis and the direction

title: Flex wrap
description: Flex wrap defines whether the flex items are forced into a single line or can be flowed into multiple lines

title: Flex flow
description: Flex flow is a shorthand for direction and wrap

title: Justify content
code snippet: jusitfy-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly

title: Align items
code snippet: align-items: flex-start | flex-end | center | stretch | baseline

title: Order
description: Order - Is used to manipulate the order of objects
